text:
Hey <@U0281PWMGKG>
I can certainly help you, Please check your DM.

Thanks;
Heena

I am winding down my agency and would love to find new work for my awesome team. I have a web developer, amazing graphic designer, marketing automation/CRM specialist, marketing manager, marketing specialist. If you’re looking to hire, I have some great recommendations for you.

Hi <@U0281PWMGKG> I’m the in-house SEO and HubSpot developer for an SEO agency. I create and optimize custom templates/modules all the time including addressing these types of issues. You can learn more about me here  <https://www.linkedin.com/in/thomasswisher/> DM me if you would like to chat.

Hey Renee, do you know if any of them would be open to contract work during their transition? I may have a few opportunities coming up in Q1 that could fit, specifically your web dev and automation/crm specialist.
<@U03K0DSRD6W> happy to chat about this, we have some openings for a few of the positions you mentioned.
